title: Broken Link in Help Center
description: The link to the 'Troubleshooting' guide in the main Help Center page returns a 404 error.

title: Export Data Missing Columns
description: When exporting user data to a CSV file, the 'Last Login Date' column is always missing.

title: Server Error 500 on Checkout
description: Intermittent server error occurs specifically when the user clicks the final 'Place Order' button.

title: Chat Widget Not Loading
description: The customer support chat widget fails to load on Chrome browser version 120.0.6099.200.

title: Filter Functionality Bug
description: Filtering products by price range returns items outside the selected maximum price.

title: Misleading Tooltip Text
description: The tooltip text for the 'Analytics' section button provides outdated information about the metrics.

title: Mobile Keyboard Overlaps Input Field
description: When entering text on a small screen iOS device, the virtual keyboard covers the input field.

title: Incorrect Currency Conversion Rate
description: Foreign currency conversion is calculating at an old, incorrect exchange rate.

title: Missing 'Forgot Password' Link
description: The link to reset password is no longer visible on the main login screen.

title: Dashboard Layout Shift on Resize
description: When resizing the browser window, the main dashboard widgets briefly jump before settling.
